name: PongTestPrototype
description:
Some simple prototype made in 48h  for some game idea based in pong but with some different gameplay ideas.

Repository with source code:

https://github.com/Athos06/PongTest/tree/master/Assets/Scripts/Architecture

HOW TO PLAY

You control your paddle with the Left/Right arrows and you can use the special skill
with space.

There are two different game modes:

● story mode where you have to face different opponents, each of them with a different AI, and you have to win the 60s match to continue to each match. 

● challenge mode: in here we just try to keep the ball in play for a long as
possible. The ball increases speed with time to make it more of a challenge,
so the whole point is to try to reach the highest score surviving for as long as
possible.
